tool_description:
#1 Top AliExpress API: Easy and Dependable Integration. 

Instantly fetching data from AliExpress is now facilitated through our robust Oracle server infrastructure. In anticipation of high demand, plans are in place to deploy multiple servers across various regions, all managed by a sophisticated load balancer system. This ensures consistently fast and reliable service, even during peak usage periods. You can trust that our service maintains optimal performance, with no downtime.

Exciting n...
name: Aliexpress True API
title: Aliexpress True API

api_list.name: v2_get_parent_categories
api_list.description: Get all available parent categories from AliExpress.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://aliexpress-true-api.p.rapidapi.com/api/v2/parent-categories"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "aliexpress-true-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: v2_get_child _categories
api_list.description: Get child categories for a specific parent category from AliExpress.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://aliexpress-true-api.p.rapidapi.com/api/v2/child-categories/6"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "aliexpress-true-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://aliexpress-true-api.p.rapidapi.com/api/v2/child-categories/{parent_category_id}"

            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",

api_list.name: v2_get_categories

api_list.name: v2_get_single_product

api_list.name: v2_get_hot_products
api_list.description: Discover popular products, each with its unique touch. Now, you can choose your preferred language, shipping destination, and much more.
